Buttons buttons.css

Buttons
class Description
.h-btn Standard button with gradient
.h-btn.h-primary Standard blue button with gradient
.h-btn.h-danger Standard red button with gradient
.h-btn Standard disabled
.h-btn.h-inset Inset button
Size


mixins/buttons

h-btn-color(light, medium, dark)
Give 3 colors to have all :active & :hover state background-colors
Text color (white or black) is defined with the darkest color
h-btn()
Main mixin to have a h-btn style
h-inset-button()
Main mixin to have a h-btn inset style
